EmailTemplate.name: Fee Exempt Rejection
EmailTemplate.subject: Fee Exemption Rejected - Please Proceed with Payment
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hello {!Contact.FirstName},
After reviewing your application, it has been determined that your request is not fee exempt. Attached is the invoice for your application, please review and proceed with payment. A link to your case has been provided below, from your case please make payment or make a check out to the SFMTA.
{!Case.Link}
Thank you,
San Francisco Municipal Transportation Agency
